job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description: ltpgtOur Client a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstandingampnbspphonecommunication skills to work as part of their new digital support teamampnbspthat will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues You willampnbsptroubleshoot Level 1 over the phone andampnbspoccasionallyampnbspin person as part of a 24x7 call centerampnbspThere could be some local travel You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug testampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtMust havesltpgtltulgtltligtGreat Customer ServiceltligtltligtLevel 1 tech skillsltligtltligtWants to grow in techltligtltligtAble to remotely troubleshoot issuesltligtltligtPossible travelampnbspupampnbsptoampnbsp25 soampnbspampnbspmust have a vehicleltligtltligtRemote and NationwideltligtltligtWindows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshootingltligtltligtFamiliarity with help desk ticketing systemsltligtltligtFamiliarity with Active Directory and VPN big ltligtltligtNetwork printer installation and configurationltligtltligtNetwork printer installation and configurationltligtltulgt
